UserMessage: Error while validating entity,Please see the list of errors and fix them

Error.ErrorText: Encounter FacilityID must be a valid provider license, Please fix Encounter FacilityID to be a valid provider license
The Receiver ID is INACTIVE in Riayati Post Office.
Header SenderId must be a valid provider license, Please fix SenderId to be a valid provider license.
Activity Code must have valid Dental CDT  value, Please make sure that the value is a valid Dental CDT code from the standard coding list.
Clinician must be a valid MOHAP clinician license from LMU
Activity Code must be a valid code from the standard coding list  CPT, HCPCS, Drug, CDT, Service Code, DRG, Please make sure that the value is a valid code from the standard coding list
